title: What is private label product design?
author: totalconfusion87

comments.content:
Hope this isn't spam-bait, as the answer is so obvious :-)

Private Label... [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Private\_label](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201080649/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Private_label "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Private\_label")

"Private label products or services are typically those manufactured or provided by one company for offer under another company's brand."

So its designing a product that can have another companyâ€™s logo slapped on it - Apple, Wal-Mart, Halliburton or whatever, rather than designing a product specifically for a brand.

Ahahaha wow do i feel stupid now...

thanks!

I googled it at work and most of the "good" websites are blocked, so I didn't find wiki's page. I just got out of school, so I don't really know what anything means. I figured that would be like... the store brands of stuff so like target's line of stuff for it's own store, but I wanted to be sure....

but i still feel like an idiot.
the lady at the company also said "gifts" when I asked her.... so maybe it wasn't completely my fault that I was confused....
